Factory

Class Trampoline

  • java.lang.Object
    • Factory.FactoryObject
      • Factory.Trampoline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnimation, SolidObject, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Trampoline
extends FactoryObject
implements java.lang.Runnable, IAnimation
    Trampoline is a Factory object. The trampoline is a solid object and does not move. Each time the trampoline is hit the trampoline image changes to show a bounce.

    • Field Summary
